feed.title: Vito Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Vito: 2.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add mariadb missing blades by @austinkregel in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/476
  • Update the vhost file to name the backend after the domain by @austinkregel in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/485
  • Add PHP version to socket vhost.blade.php by @austinkregel in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/487
  • Fix docker build by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/491
  • Increase the content width by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/492
  • Built-in File Manager by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/458
  • Firewall Refactor by @RichardAnderson in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/488
  • Don't escape deploy script because it converts quotes and other special character to htmlentities. by @AbdelElrafa in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/498
  • Fix .env Files for Isolated Users by @RichardAnderson in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/496
  • Fix auto-deployment branch by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/506
  • Bump esbuild, laravel-vite-plugin and vite by @dependabot in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/507
  • Fix filemanager permissions by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/508

New Contributors

  • @AbdelElrafa made their first contribution in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/498

Full Changelog: https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/compare/2.2.1...2.3.0

entry.title: New release for Vito: 2.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add logs:clear command by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/509
  • Add missing php-intl package when installing php by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/510
  • Ensure newly created branches are available for switching by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/511
  • Display repository and branch in site details by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/512
  • Fix prevent "null" from appearing in console after user selection (#501) by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/514
  • Fix regex in File Manager to support hyphenated usernames and groups by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/516
  • Fix variables not being saved in database when executing a script by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/518
  • Implement Site Commands (#298) by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/519
  • Fix console showing null in path by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/525
  • Sail default container name to match docker-compose.yml by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/532
  • Database collations by @RichardAnderson in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/489
  • Fix run_action helper by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/540
  • Add isolated users for switching in Vito console by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/533
  • Add PHPStan level 7 by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/544
  • Add database and database users sync by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/537
  • Add workers to servers by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/547

New Contributors

  • @dyanakiev made their first contribution in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/510

Full Changelog: https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/compare/2.3.0...2.4.0

entry.title: New release for Vito: 2.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add endpoint to update site aliases by @J4Wx in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/551
  • Add endpoint for reading & updating site deployment script by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/562
  • Add redirects to sites by @J4Wx in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/552
  • Add endpoint for triggering site deployment by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/563
  • Add endpoint for reading and updating site .env file by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/564
  • Bump vite from 6.2.0 to 6.2.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/574
  • Fix worker users @J4Wx in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/567
  • Allow reuse of a database name by @J4Wx in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/571
  • Add missing backticks in Blade for MySQL/MariaDB database names with hyphens by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/523
  • Bump vite from 6.2.3 to 6.2.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/576
  • Fix aws connect bug by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/577

New Contributors

  • @J4Wx made their first contribution in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/551

Full Changelog: https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/compare/2.4.0...2.5.0

entry.title: New release for Vito: 2.5.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump league/commonmark from 2.6.1 to 2.7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/595
  • Revert "fix: add missing backticks in Blade for MySQL/MariaDB database names with hyphens" by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/601

Full Changelog: https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/compare/2.5.0...2.5.1

entry.title: New release for Vito: 2.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add Caddy Server Support Alongside Nginx by @rtraselbd in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/600

Full Changelog: https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/compare/2.5.1...2.6.0
